We use open , prospective , cross-over study compare safety efficacy two different treatment protocol control ovarian stimulation egg donor . 20 participant undergo two cycle stimulation . DOC.criteria: 1 . Age less equal 32 year old 2 . BMI < 35 3 . Eligible controlled ovarian simulation 4 . No PCOtype ovary ( PCO USS image , > 2.1 LH ; FSH ratio cycle day 3 , insulin resistance , increase testosterone free testosterone ) 5 . Meet requirement become egg donor 6 . Willingness ability participate comply study protocol duration study 7 . Baseline FSH < 11 1 . Clinically significant systemic disease 2 . Any contraindication gonadotropin therapy 3 . LH : FSH ratio great 3 4 . Pregnancy past 3 month 5 . Any medical condition , judgment investigator may interfere absorption , distribution , metabolism excretion drug 6 . Simultaneous participation another clinical trial 7 . Known active substance abuse , include tobacco alcohol ( > 10 cigarettes/day ) 8 . Refusal inability comply protocol 9 . Known poor ovarian response
